Documentation for this format

name: ExtensionPlanDefinition_Action_Input
title: Cross-version Extension `R5.PlanDefinition.action.input` for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents the FHIR R5 element `PlanDefinition.action.input` for use in FHIR R4.
purpose:
This extension is part of the cross-version definitions generated to enable use of the
element `PlanDefinition.action.input` as defined in FHIR R5
in FHIR R4.

The source element is defined as:
`PlanDefinition.action.input` 0..* `BackboneElement`

Across FHIR versions, the element set has been mapped as:
*  R5: `PlanDefinition.action.input` 0..* `BackboneElement`
*  R4B: `PlanDefinition.action.input` 0..* `DataRequirement`
*  R4: `PlanDefinition.action.input` 0..* `DataRequirement`

Following are the generation technical comments:
Element `PlanDefinition.action.input` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `PlanDefinition.action.input` as `Equivalent`, concept domain: `NotRelatedTo`, value domain: `NotRelatedTo`.
Note available implied context: `PlanDefinition.action.action.input` because `PlanDefinition.action.action` is defined via a content reference to `PlanDefinition.action`.
